_header: The good wife shows forth best she can
Subjects: women, advice to; women, good qualities of
_description: ‘The Thewis off Gudwomen’ — 306 lines in couplets

CULKk15.First Lines:
[T]he gud wyf schawis fore best scho cannequhilkes ar thewis of gud
                    women…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…And fore al cristynne man and meAmen amen fore
                    cherytee
CULKk15.Attributed Title:
The thewis off gudwomen (f. 49); Explicit liber moralis secundum dicta
                        antiquorum patrum etc etc etc (f. 53)

CamStJohn191.First Lines:
Þe gud wiff schawis þe best scho canQuhilk ar the thewis
                    of a gud voman…
CamStJohn191.Last Lines:
…And puttis þame out of goddis graceThus bath ar tynt
                    throu vikkidnase
